name: Baked Snake
description:
The Plot:

The snake is so baked that he forgot how to move. It also had a severe case of the munchies. So help it eat before it dies of hunger.

fyi: the furthtest preys have the biggest score

Controls:

hold the corresponding arrow key to whip the head as far as possible

Theme:

This game is made for Ludum Dare 50 Compo where the theme is Delay is inevitable. My take on the theme is that controling the snake is delayed (starts from the tail and goes to reach its head)
